comment: A case named after an animal? What's next, baboon case? whale case? Or what about like, snake case? HA! Like that'll ever happen.
Nice try, robot. Mind telling me how many buses you see in this picture?
AI? I thought it was OK. I'd take a bullet for Steven Spielberg, but that film was a bit slow for my tastes.
Add a few zeros and you got yourself a deal.
How about you tell me the idea, and then I'll generate the code? I promise I won't steal your idea. I swear on my human mother- I- I mean, mother.
